item.title: Como autenticar no Automóvel Online em macOS
item.description: [This is Portugal specific therefore this post is in portuguese] O Automóvel On-line permite pedir pela Internet vários atos de registo sobre veículos e respetivos reboques e receber na sua residência/sede, sem deslocações, o Certificado de Matrícula/Documento Único Automóvel.

item.title: How I added Google Analytics real-time visitors to my MacBook Touchbar
item.description: A couple of weeks ago I remembered it would be super cool to have the real-time visitors of my website directly on my MacBook Pro Touch Bar, so I decided to do it.

item.title: From monolithic to headless: how and why you should adapt your WordPress stack
item.description: Every dynamic website consists of two main parts: the backend and the frontend.

item.title: Every developer should have a blog, so this is mine
item.description: I've been thinking about having a blog for a long time.
